name: NETXP LINUX pkexec Invocation
description: Monitors pkexec invocations, which may indicate privilege escalation. This rule focuses on the use of pkexec, a tool for executing programs as another user with the ability to escalate privileges. Detection of such invocations helps in identifying potential security threats related to privilege escalation.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "pkexec" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
